body.p: The 2010 ED proposed to carry forward the requirement that an entity should transfer amounts recognised in other comprehensive income directly to retained earnings. However, IFRSs do not define the phrase ‘retained earnings’ and the Board has not discussed what it should mean. Moreover, there exist jurisdiction‑specific restrictions on components of equity. The amendments made in 2011 permit an entity to transfer the cumulative remeasurements within equity, and do not impose specific requirements on that transfer .
